lines.text: Dil ki adalat pyar ka mukadama, dekho vakil babu ban gaye balma... In the High Court of the heart, in the Court proceedings of love, the lawyer has become a sweetheart...
Eh mere dil har dum ye dua kar, ya mere malik tu sabka bala kar... My heart also wishes well, O my God please help everyone...

Tumse miley bin chain nahin aahta main kya karun, mujhey to ye bhi kahena bhi nahin aahta main kya karun... I am restless without meeting you, what to do, I don't even know how to say this, what to do...
